message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I am looking for a better deal. Can we negotiate the price down to $90?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see that you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110.
